summary: We examined the Department of Health and Human Services' funding options to help address immediate needs of a public health emergency or threat. HHS has used a fund designated for infectious disease emergencies and threats like COVID-19 and Ebola. The fund can't be used for other types of health threats that arise, for example, from floods. title: Public Health Preparedness: HHS Reserve Funding for Emergencies
